short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search in Bold360 with just a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bold360 ai is your relentless warrior when it comes to helping your companyâ€™s customer-facing employees. It never sleeps, never talks back, never goes on holiday; always ready to help. And with natural language processing, Bold360 ai helps employees solve their own problems anytime.

With the Bold360 Chrome Extension you can search for answers in your Bold360 Knowledge Base with just a click, or immediately suggest additional topics to your Knowledge Base Manager.

Note: You need a Bold360 subscription to use this Chrome Extension.
